data.eml:eml: Notes on the shrimp genus Palaemon Weber, 1795 (Crustacea, Decapoda, Palaemonidae) and related genera from Taiwan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ashelby, Christopher W., Lin, Wei-Cheng, Grave, Sammy De, Chan, Tin-Yam (2018): Notes on the shrimp genus Palaemon Weber, 1795 (Crustacea, Decapoda, Palaemonidae) and related genera from Taiwan. Zootaxa 4446 (4): 575-595, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4446.4.10
